derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (denoting a drawing or plan): from Greek eikonographia 'sketch, description', from eikōn 'likeness' + -graphia 'writing'

entry.def: The iconography of a group of people consists of the symbols, pictures, and objects which represent their ideas and way of life.
